roadmap.title: ACI SmartTrader Suite ‚Äì Official Roadmap
roadmap.vision: ACI SmartTrader Suite merges ACI Learn (adaptive education) and ACI Risk AI (discipline engine) so traders progress fast without blowing their capital. Every phase finances the AI, the staking rewards, and the upcoming SmartTrader DAO.

items.title: SmartTrader Launch
items.description: Lay the foundation of the suite, the token, and the public presale.
objectives: Mint the ACI ERC-20 supply (1B max).
Launch the website plus the public presale.
Roll out the ACI SmartTrader Suite brand.

items.title: ACI Learn (v1)
objectives: Adaptive AI lessons with courses, quizzes, and mistake tracking.
Trader psychology + behavioural profiling.
Learn-to-Earn system: earn ACI every time you progress.

items.title: ACI Risk AI
items.description: Ship the risk-management AI connected to MT4/Binance.
objectives: Risk AI connected to MT4 / Binance.
Auto position sizing + blocking when limits are exceeded.
Daily discipline and risk reports.

items.title: SmartTrader Platform (Learn + Risk)
items.description: Fuse the two AIs into one Safe Academy dashboard.
objectives: Unified dashboard: stats, psychology, performance, XP.
‚ÄúSafe Academy‚Äù AI dashboard.
Staking & rewards for disciplined traders.

items.title: ACI Network Development (2026)
items.description: Prepare the native blockchain designed for high-speed AI trading.
objectives: Kick off development of the ACI blockchain.
Ensure full EVM compatibility.
Optimize the network for low-latency AI + trading workloads.
Launch a public testnet.
Migrate the ecosystem progressively onto ACI Network.

items.title: DAO & Expansion
objectives: Launch the SmartTrader DAO (votes, treasury, community fund).
Integrate partner brokers.
Release the SmartTrader mobile app.

hero.title: ACI Learn
hero.intro: Adaptive AI training that analyses your level, tracks mistakes, and adjusts every module in real time.
hero.stakingLine: Stake or hold ACI to unlock the full ACI Learn path and earn Learn-to-Earn rewards.

modules.title: Adaptive AI learning
modules.description: Dynamic lessons, quizzes, and scenario builders that react to your results.

modules.title: Mistake tracking
modules.description: Screenshots, notes, and error logs auto-tagged so you never repeat the same pattern.

modules.title: Trader psychology
modules.description: Breathing drills, mindset routines, and Safe Academy snapshots keep emotions in check.

modules.title: ACI rewards
modules.description: Learn-to-Earn missions credit ACI every time you finish a module with discipline.

iaSection.heading: The program adapts to you ‚Äî not the other way around.
iaSection.paragraph1: ACI Learn observes your behaviour (wins, losses, stress signals) and instantly adjusts the next lesson, quiz, or routine.
iaSection.paragraph2: Your emotional notes, voice inputs, and Safe Academy indicators teach the AI how to coach you better. More ACI staked unlocks deeper analysis and premium tracks.
bullets: Adaptive lessons that change difficulty in real time.
Mistake log + emotional cues to prevent repeat errors.
Rewards, badges, and XP boosts paid in ACI.

steps.title: 1. Stake your ACI
steps.description: Connect your wallet, lock your tokens, and activate the intelligent training.

steps.title: 2. AI calibration
steps.description: The ACI engine evaluates your level and selects the first tailored modules.

steps.title: 3. Living journey
steps.description: Follow videos, test your knowledge, and receive instant AI feedback.

steps.title: 4. Active rewards
steps.description: Earn badges, perks, and deeper access as your results improve.

ecosystem.title: Education + risk + rewards.
ecosystem.paragraph1: ACI Learn and ACI Risk AI share the same data: what you learn influences how the risk engine reacts, and vice versa.
ecosystem.paragraph2: When your discipline increases, ACI Learn unlocks tougher missions and Risk AI relaxes blocks slightly. The suite keeps you performing without burning capital.

coachIASection.titleHome: ACI Learn + ACI Risk AI keep you sharp and protected.
coachIASection.titlePage: Two coordinated AIs to coach you and block costly mistakes.
coachIASection.subtitle: Education, psychology, and risk management aligned inside one discipline plan.

Safe Academy dashboard tracks stress, mistakes, and XP every week.
ACI Risk AI calculates position size and blocks trades when limits are hit.
Earn ACI each time you stay disciplined during sessions.

botTitle: ACI Risk AI ‚Äî automated discipline for every trade.
botSubtitle: Connect MT4/Binance, define your guard rails, and let the AI calculate sizing, block excess risk, and send discipline reports.
botOverviewDescription: ACI Risk AI analyses each order, compares it with your max risk per trade, and blocks any position that violates the playbook. It feeds Safe Academy with daily discipline metrics.
botAdvantageAi.title: Adaptive sizing
botAdvantageAi.desc: Position size, leverage, and stop levels recalculated instantly based on volatility and your max risk.
botAdvantageSignals.title: Auto blocks
botAdvantageSignals.desc: Orders that exceed limits are paused, tagged, and sent back to you with corrective actions.
botAdvantage24.title: 24/7 guard rails
botAdvantage24.desc: MT4, Binance, and API monitoring that never sleeps. Cooldown rules trigger even when you are away.
botAdvantageSecurity.title: Discipline reports
botAdvantageSecurity.desc: Daily Safe Academy report summarising blocked trades, saved drawdown, and compliance streaks.
botPerformanceDesc: Live statistics of blocked trades, exposure saved, and respect of your trading rules.
botMetricWinrateValue: 95% of over-risk trades stopped before execution
botCTADesc: Beta access is limited to traders who stake ACI and share their metrics. Join the waitlist to get notified first.
botFlowTitle: How ACI Risk AI keeps you safe
botFlowSubtitle: Set your limits once‚Äîthe AI enforces them across MT4/Binance.
botStepConnect.title: 1. Connect your accounts
botStepConnect.desc: Securely link MT4, Binance, or your API keys. Permissions stay read/trade-only.
botStepConfigure.title: 2. Configure guard rails
botStepConfigure.desc: Define risk per trade, daily loss, cooldowns, and the behaviours the AI must block.
botStepMonitor.title: 3. Monitor & improve
botStepMonitor.desc: Receive instant blocks plus daily Safe Academy reports to review your discipline.
botChecklistBalance: Defined risk per trade and daily drawdown.
botChecklistPlan: Trading plan + timeframe shared with the AI.
botDisclaimer: ACI Risk AI blocks orders when your limits are reached. You keep full control of your strategy and execution.

faqPage.title: ACI SmartTrader Suite FAQ
faqPage.intro: The answers to the most common questions about ACI Learn, ACI Risk AI, and the ACI token. No hype, just transparency.

items.question: Does the AI Coach replace a human trader?
items.answer: No. ACI SmartTrader Suite provides analytics and routines, but you stay in control. The AI augments your skills‚Äîit doesn‚Äôt give financial advice or open positions for you.

items.question: What does the ACI Token unlock?
items.answer: It grants access to ACI Learn, powers ACI Risk AI, delivers staking rewards, and prepares your voting power inside the SmartTrader DAO.

items.question: Can I test the training journeys before buying ACI?
items.answer: Yes. The discovery access includes video excerpts and free templates. To activate the full journeys and Safe Academy follow-up, you need to hold the required ACI threshold.

items.question: Is staking available to everyone?
items.answer: Staking is open to ACI token holders who meet the minimum amount. It rewards long-term commitments and secures ecosystem liquidity.

items.question: Does the ecosystem provide financial advice?
items.answer: Never. We deliver educational support, tools, and personalised monitoring, but every investor remains responsible for their decisions and risk management.

faqPage.moreQuestions: Have a specific question? Reach out via the Contact page‚Äîwe answer within 24 hours.

roadmapPage.title: ACI SmartTrader Suite ‚Äì Official Roadmap

tokenPage.title: Advanced Capital International Token (ACI)
tokenPage.intro: ACI is the ERC-20 heart of Advanced Capital International‚Äîa deflationary, transparent asset powering education, payments, staking rewards, and long-term governance.

tokenomicsBreakdown.title: 1 billion ACI distributed for growth, liquidity, and burns
tokenomicsBreakdown.subtitle: Supply is fully minted at deployment, with zero taxes, no mint function, and manual burns executed by the multisig treasury.

rows.label: Public Presale

rows.label: Staking Rewards

rows.label: Team & Founders

rows.label: Marketing & Partnerships

rows.label: Buyback & Burn Reserve

tokenPage.accessDescription: Hold or stake ACI to join the presale, unlock staking yields, provide liquidity, and prepare for the future governance rollout.

items.title: Fixed ERC-20 design
items.text: 1,000,000,000 ACI minted once, zero taxes, no mint function, and manual burns available to every holder. ACI tokens unlock ACI Learn and ACI Risk AI, finance rewards for disciplined traders, and fuel the SmartTrader DAO.

items.title: Eight-week presale
items.text: 300,000,000 ACI sold for ETH with progressive pricing ($0.05 ‚Üí $0.30). Tokens are delivered after the sale, and leftovers are burned automatically.

items.title: Dedicated staking reserve
items.text: 15% of supply is escrowed inside the staking reserve and streamed over 24 months, rewarding wallets that commit to the full lock.

items.title: Multisig ownership
items.text: Ownership is transferred to a Gnosis Safe after deployment; the multisig executes burns and treasury actions with published proofs.

items.title: Audited OpenZeppelin stack
items.text: The contract inherits ERC20, Burnable, and Ownable modules with no proxy, no taxes, and audit preparation with CertiK, Hacken, and SolidProof.

items.title: Transparent treasury
items.text: 0% transaction fees, manual burn events (quarterly + annual) and a reserve dedicated to buybacks and liquidity across DEX/CEX pools.

cta.title: Build with Advanced Capital International
cta.subtitle: Review the tokenomics, join the presale, or reach out to coordinate listings, staking campaigns, or enterprise integrations.

accessFeatures.title: Stake with flexible locks
accessFeatures.text: Lock ACI for 1, 3, or 6 months to receive 5%‚Äì20% APR rewards funded by the staking reserve.

accessFeatures.title: Manual burn program
accessFeatures.text: Quarterly burns remove 10‚Äì25M ACI, plus the Annual Burn Event (up to 50M) executed by the multisig with Etherscan proofs.

accessFeatures.title: Liquidity & buybacks
accessFeatures.text: 100M ACI is locked for 12 months on Uniswap & CEX partners, and an extra 100M reserve covers buybacks and treasury burns.

stakingSection.title: ACI Staking Model
stakingSection.description: Staking locks tokens for 24 months and distributes rewards from the dedicated 15% reserve (150,000,000 ACI). This keeps liquidity aligned with long-term builders.

simulation.title: Participation impact on rewards
simulation.subtitle: The entire 150M ACI reserve is allocated over two years. Fewer participants means a higher reward multiple per staker.
simulation.footnote: Simulations are indicative and assume the full 150M ACI reserve is distributed linearly across 24 months.

disclaimerText: Always do your own research. Nothing here is financial advice.
copyright: ¬© 2025 ACI SmartTrader Suite. All rights reserved.
aboutMissionDesc: ACI is an innovative cryptocurrency built on two pillars: an untraceable payment method and exclusive crypto training. In a world where digital transaction surveillance is pervasive, ACI offers a private and fully free payment solution, empowering users to reclaim financial autonomy.
aboutOriginDesc: The ACI project was born in 2024 from a simple observation: crypto payment solutions are becoming less discreet and less educational. ACI was therefore designed to combine anonymity, continuous training, and real utility within a secure and accessible ecosystem.
aboutCommitmentPoints: Launch of an untraceable payment system based on ACI
Access to full training once a certain ACI token threshold is reached
Audited smart contracts and absolute transparency
An identified founder and a united community
aboutCommunityDesc: ACI is not just another crypto: it‚Äôs a new Web3 vision where every holder becomes an active participant. Thanks to our training system, users holding a certain amount of tokens can access exclusive courses on trading, security, and cryptocurrencies. Together, let‚Äôs build a secure, free, and educational alternative for tomorrow‚Äôs world.
tokenomicsDesc: Final breakdown of the ACI ERC-20: presale schedule, fixed supply, manual burns, and security commitments.
raiseGoalText: The eight-week public presale sells 300,000,000 ACI for roughly {{amount}} in USD contributions (payments accepted in ETH only). Tokens are distributed after the sale and every unsold token is automatically burned.
founderRemunerationText: ACI is an Ethereum ERC-20 with {{percent}}, 18 decimals, OpenZeppelin ERC20 + Burnable + Ownable code. Every holder can burn tokens, and the multisig treasury can burn from the contract or treasury wallets.
tokenSupplyText: A fixed supply of {{total}} is minted at deployment. 50,000,000 ACI are burned at launch, quarterly burns remove 10‚Äì25 million ACI, and the Annual Burn Event can remove up to 50 million ACI‚Äîeach burn is executed manually by the Gnosis Safe multisig with public proof on-chain.
howtoStepsTitle: Steps to Buy ACI SmartTrader Suite

howtoSteps.text: Connect your wallet via the top button
Select the USD amount to invest
Confirm the transaction in your wallet

howtoFaq.question: Can I buy with a credit card?

howtoSecurity: Only buy on the official site: acipresale.com
Always verify the smart contract address before transacting.

faqItems.question: What is the price of ACI during the presale?
Can I participate from any country?
faqItems.answer: Yes, the project is open internationally (except in crypto-restricted countries).

faqItems.question: Where will my ACI be stored after purchase?
faqItems.answer: Directly in your wallet address, no intermediaries.

faqItems.question: Are ACI tokens transferable immediately?
faqItems.answer: ACI will be transferable after presale ends or at official listing.

faqItems.question: Can I resell my ACI later?
faqItems.answer: Yes, once listed on a DEX/CEX, you can freely resell them.

faqItems.question: Is there a minimum or maximum purchase?
faqItems.answer: Recommended minimum: $10 ‚Äî No maximum (while supplies last).

faqItems.question: Can I buy from mobile?
faqItems.answer: Yes, via MetaMask or TrustWallet Mobile.

faqItems.question: Can I purchase with a credit card?

stakingNetworkMismatch: Wrong network ‚Äî connect to Ethereum Mainnet.
stakingConfigErrorContract: Invalid staking contract address. Check REACT_APP_STAKING_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.
stakingConfigErrorToken: Invalid ACI token address. Check REACT_APP_STAKING_TOKEN_ADDRESS.
stakingError: Something went wrong. Please try again or check your wallet.
stakingApprovePrompt: Approve the staking contract to use your ACI before depositing.
stakingApproveSuccess: Approval confirmed. You can stake your ACI now.
stakingStakeSuccess: Staking confirmed! Your ACI is now earning rewards.
stakingUnstakeSuccess: Unstake completed. Your ACI is back in your wallet.
stakingInsufficientAmount: Enter an amount above zero (and meet the minimum).
stakingSignerMissing: Wallet not ready to sign transactions. Reconnect and try again.
stakingPoolInvalid: Selected staking pool is not supported.
stakingContractBalanceWarning: Rewards pool only holds {{balance}} ACI. Pending rewards may be delayed until it is refilled.

coach3d.title: AI Coach (3D Avatar)
coach3d.subtitle: Talk with your AI coach in real time. The 3D avatar reacts to your voice and emotions.
coach3d.noConversation: Start the conversation to see messages here.
coach3d.promptFallback: Microphone recognition is unavailable. Type your message to ask the coach:

error.sttUnsupported: Speech recognition is not supported in this browser. Use the text field below to chat.
error.ttsUnsupported: Voice playback is blocked in this browser. Switch to Chrome, Edge, or Safari over HTTPS and allow speech synthesis to hear the coach.
error.generic: The coach is unavailable. Please try again later.
error.microDenied: Microphone not available. Allow access in your browser settings.
error.avatarLoad: 3D avatar unavailable. A simplified visualization is displayed.
error.cameraUnavailable: Camera control is managed by the emotion detection module. Enable it from the detection card.

desc.highStress: a lot of tension in your voice

calm: Breathe, I'm staying by your side.
energetic: I can feel that spark in you.
neutral: Thanks for sharing that with me.
I'm noting every nuance you're expressing.

guidance.stress: Let's take 20 seconds together: inhale for 4 counts, hold for 2, exhale slowly for 6. As you breathe out, picture the pressure leaving.
guidance.fear: Let's identify what worries you: write down the scenario you fear and note beside it what you truly control.
guidance.sadness: I sense your energy is lower. Allow yourself a conscious pause: breathe, stretch, then list three micro wins from recently, even tiny ones.
guidance.confidence: Let's rebuild your confidence: recall a time you held steady despite doubt and break down what made the difference.
guidance.motivation: When motivation dips, return to your core intention. Choose a ten-minute action that rekindles your why.
guidance.focus: Let's tighten your focus: state your goal in one sentence, block a 30-minute slot, and remove one key distraction.
guidance.anger: I feel the tension. Quickly write what triggered you, then translate each complaint into a concrete need or boundary.
guidance.gratitude: Thank you for sharing. Anchor that gratitude: name a person or insight you want to honor in your next step.

followUp.stress: What's the main source of that tension for you right now?
followUp.fear: What's the first concrete action you can take to ease that concern?
followUp.sadness: Which of those wins could you extend this week?
followUp.confidence: What lever from that experience can you reuse now?
followUp.motivation: Which mini-action would give you momentum right after our exchange?
followUp.focus: Which distraction can you neutralize now to protect that 30-minute plan?
followUp.anger: What boundary will you set to stay aligned without exploding?
followUp.gratitude: How could you celebrate that gratitude in the next 24 hours?

guidanceFallback.stress: Let's slow down together: take a deep breath in, hold for two seconds, then exhale gently. When you're ready, tell me what would help release the pressure.
guidanceFallback.positive: Let's harness that momentum: how can you turn this positive feeling into a concrete action today?
guidanceFallback.gratitude: Let's keep this gratitude as an anchor. Which next step would extend that state?
guidanceFallback.default: I'm here to support you step by step. What would you like to clarify first?

followUpFallback.question: What concrete answer would help you move forward calmly?
followUpFallback.statement: Which next step do you want to engage right after this share?

reflection.question: You're asking: ‚Äú{{text}}‚Äù.
reflection.empty: Tell me more: how exactly are you feeling?
reflection.liveSync: I'm synced with your emotional state in real time, let's stay aligned.

outro.calm: I'm staying here at your pace.
outro.energetic: Let's keep this momentum, I'm with you.

messages.text: Perfect. I‚Äôm syncing your action plan and I‚Äôll remind you of the required routines before every session.

ui.title: ACI EmotionScan ‚Äî Voice + Vision
ui.description: EmotionScan listens to your voice and camera feed to map stress, confidence, and behaviour in real time before adjusting your SmartTrader plan.
ui.voiceHint: EmotionScan adapts your routines based on your voice every second.

toggle.tooltipSession: Stop the session before changing video analysis.

consent.title: Microphone permission required
consent.description: Allow microphone access to launch emotion detection. Audio stays on this device‚Äîonly the computed metrics are displayed.

preSession.intro: Everything is ready. Click start and speak exactly as in a real situation. You can stop anytime to review the summary.

session.title: EmotionScan Session
session.description: Metrics refresh every 750 ms for a smooth experience.
session.voiceInsightsHint: Live AI analysis: tone, energy, emotional stability, and SmartTrader recommendations.

summary.title: Session summary
summary.restartNote: Data remains in your browser. Restart the module whenever you like.

chart.empty: No data recorded for this session.

errors.micDenied: Microphone access denied. Check your browser permissions.
errors.cameraDenied: Camera access denied. Update your browser permissions.
errors.videoModelsFailed: Unable to load the video analysis models.
errors.videoFallback: Camera could not be activated. Switching to voice-only mode.
errors.voiceAiFallback: AI voice analysis unavailable. Using local metrics instead.

coachCue.highStress: Take 10 seconds to breathe, drop your shoulders and resume at a calmer pace.
coachCue.lowConfidenceFillers: State your core idea in one sentence before continuing.
coachCue.energetic: Great energy! Push one argument for two minutes.
coachCue.lowConfidence: Take two deep breaths, focus on your key message before you continue.
coachCue.balanced: Keep this clear tone. Follow your plan step by step.

voiceSummary.awaiting: I‚Äôm listening‚Äîkeep speaking for a complete analysis.
voiceSummary.highStressLowConfidence: High tension detected: slow down, reset and resume.
voiceSummary.highStress: Lots of energy! Channel it by clarifying your next point.
voiceSummary.highConfidence: Stable, confident voice‚Äîperfect to deliver your plan.
voiceSummary.lowConfidence: Calm but hesitant: craft your next point in a strong sentence.
voiceSummary.highPitch: Pitch rising‚Äîslow down and breathe for clarity.
voiceSummary.balanced: Balanced delivery: keep this rhythm and emphasise key ideas.

advice.reset: Create a short reset ritual (breathing, grounding) before your next session.
advice.intention: Write your intention in one sentence and say it aloud before starting.
advice.pause: Practise conscious pauses‚Äîstop whenever a filler word comes.
advice.slowDown: Train yourself to slow down by reading a short passage slowly.
advice.challenge: Challenge: explain a complex idea in 120 seconds next time.
advice.structure: Use ‚ÄúSituation - Action - Result‚Äù to keep your speech structured.
advice.setup: Choose a calm environment and test your microphone ahead of time.

fallback.title: Static mode
fallback.description: WebGL is not available on this device. The 3D coach will display on a compatible browser (recent desktop or mobile).
fallback.note: No worries: the rest of the experience still works.
